user.title: Configure SecretSentry
user.description:
SecretSentry scans your Home Assistant configuration for potential security issues like exposed secrets, missing gitignore entries, and insecure HTTP settings.

Default scan interval is {default_interval} minutes.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to scan for security issues (300-86400 seconds)
